recpol.pro


NAME: RECPOL PURPOSE: Convert 2-d rectangular coordinates to polar coordinates. CATEGORY: CALLING SEQUENCE: recpol, x, y, r, a INPUTS: x, y = vector in rectangular form. in KEYWORD PARAMETERS: Keywords: /DEGREES means angle is in degrees, else radians. OUTPUTS: r, a = vector in polar form: radius, angle. out COMMON BLOCKS: NOTES: MODIFICATION HISTORY: R. Sterner. 18 Aug, 1986. Johns Hopkins University Applied Physics Laboratory. RES 13 Feb, 1991 --- added /degrees. R. Sterner, 30 Dec, 1991 --- simplified. R. Sterner, 25 May, 1993 --- Fixed atan (0,0) problem.
